text: Listen is a song performed by American R&B; singer-songwriter Beyoncé Knowles in the 2006 movie Dreamgirls. It was released as the first single from the film's soundtrack album on December 5, 2006 in the United States and on was released in the United Kingdom on February 19, 2007.http://www.hmv.co.uk/hmvweb/displayProductDetails.do?ctx=280;-1;-1;-1&sku;=602765 UK release date confirmed. The song can also be found as a hidden track on international editions of the singer's second solo studio album, B'Day (2006). == Track listing == * International CD single: # "Listen" 3:37 # "Irreplaceable" (DJ Speedy Remix) 4:17 == Charts == Chart (2007) Peak position Austria Top 75 32 Brazil Hot 100 52 Euro Top 200 33 Eurochart Top 100-Billboard 24 German Singles Top 100 18 Indonesia LIMA Top 50 Charts 1 Irish Singles Chart 6 Polish Hit FM 1 Italian Singles Chart 3 Lithuania Airplay Chart 6 Netherlands Urban Top 100 28 Pepsi World Chart Pepsi World Chart "Pepsi World Chart 3 Crunch World Chart 2 Swiss Singles Top 100 10 Tokio Hot 100 18 UK Singles Chart 16 UK Official Download Chart 22 UK R&B; Singles Chart 3 U.S. Billboard Hot 100 61 U.S. Billboard Pop 100 56 U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs 23 U.S. Billboard Adult R&B; Airplay 12 == Notes == Category:Beyoncé songs Category:2007 songs
title: Listen (song)
